sentences.en: A usually residential area or community outlying a city.
sentences.cn: 在城市外的通常作为居民区的地区或社区.

sentences.en: His hometown is in an outlying mountain area.
sentences.cn: 他的家乡地处边远山区.

sentences.en: Massive land slides have buried roads to outlying villages.
sentences.cn: 大量的路边碎石封住了通往边远乡村的路.

sentences.en: Our convoys have been attacked, as well as some outlying outposts.
sentences.cn: 我们的护航船, 以及几个边远哨站都受到了攻击.

sentences.en: Some outlying companies didn't know what Tower One was and Tower Two.
sentences.cn: 一些同事还搞不清楚这是一号塔楼还是二号.

sentences.en: Special arrangement for client at outlying island, surcharge depends on special route.
sentences.cn: 离岛客户将另作安排, 根据路程作额外收费.

sentences.en: The gulls which haunted the outlying rocks in a prodigious number.
sentences.cn: 数不清的海鸥在遥远的岩石上栖息.

sentences.en: The main industry on the outlying islands is farming.
sentences.cn: 这些偏远岛屿的主要产业为农业。

sentences.en: The outlying fixed wheels are mounted an axle ( of tubing ).
sentences.cn: 大飞轮固定在轴 ( 管材 ) 上.

sentences.en: The outlying states of Alaska and Hawaii were both admitted in 1959.
sentences.cn: 边远的阿拉斯加和夏威夷州两个都在1959年被承认.

sentences.en: The outlying villages were formally annexed by the town last year.
sentences.cn: 那些偏远的村庄于去年正式被并入该镇.

sentences.en: There were several established churches in the outlying regions of the area.
sentences.cn: 在周围的偏远地方,有几家已经建立的教会.

sentences.en: These stores were often located in outlying urban areas and the suburbs.
sentences.cn: 这些超市常常位于城市偏远的地方和郊区.

sentences.en: They live on the outskirts ( ie in an outlying district ) of Paris.
sentences.cn: 他们住在巴黎 市郊.

sentences.en: Tourists can visit outlying areas like the Napa Valley Wine Country.
sentences.cn: 游客可以前往像纳帕谷酒乡这样远离城市喧嚣的地方游览。

trans.tran_cn: 偏僻的，边远的，无关的，题外
trans.tran_en: far from the centre of a city, town etc or from a main building

trans.tran_cn: 放在…外面；在撒谎上胜过（outlie的ing形式）
